definitions.definition: The act of concealing oneself and lying in wait to attack or kill by surprise .
An attack launched from a concealed position .
The concealed position or state from which a surprise attack is launched .
The troops posted in a concealed place, for attacking by surprise ; those who lie in wait .

main_definition: The act of concealing oneself and lying in wait to attack or kill by surprise .
secondary_definitions: An attack launched from a concealed position .
The concealed position or state from which a surprise attack is launched .
The troops posted in a concealed place, for attacking by surprise ; those who lie in wait .
